title: WEDNESDAY NIGHT LINKS 09/04/02
content:
WNL is specifically designed to give typophiles something to do at work on Thursday and Friday.   
   
Somebody want to volunteer for tonight?   
   
Just post a bunch a type-related links.   
   
bj
author: beejay

comments.content:
I've just had the chance to use Nanucom. Here in Canada, we have recently added a 3rd official language for our new territory Nunavut. The language is absolutely beautiful. I don't understand a word of it, but gosh darnit, its so purdy.   
   
 ![inuktitut](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018132105im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/2634.gif)   
   
here's a link for you all to download and play with it if ya want. isin't it lovely? I just wanna lick it.   
   
http://www.nunavut.com/technology/english/download.html

thanks Tanya great link. tasty.   
   
Will post some links (late) tonight in GENERAL DISCUSSIONS and try to make it a regular Wednesday night thing. If anyone else wants to join in, the more the merrier. Just go to GENERAL DISCUSSIONS..Create New Conversation.   
bj
